messages.message:
Hello team,
This is a PSA to remind everyone that sandboxes should be hibernated by the users via Admiral when they are not planning to use the box for the day.

*FAQ: Don't we have auto-hibernation?*
Auto-hibernation should only be used as a fallback mechanism in case we forget to do hibernate manually. When a box is auto-hibernated, it means that it has been running for 4 hours unnecessarily, which can be quite costly.
